entry.title: Work opportunity signal boost for an amazing team building an amazing product!! 🚀🚀🚀
entry.summary: Work opportunity signal boost for an amazing team building an amazing product!! 🚀🚀🚀 Lonis.sol/eth: Great to partner w @matthuang @paradigm @jordancooper @PaceCap et al on a $5M seed! At Dework, we're building Dework using Dework! We only have 3 core team members - but 5-6 flexible contributors building Dework with us, on their own terms. If that sounds interesting, DMs open! https://twitter.com/deworkxyz/status/1532018865647001600

entry.summary: RT Orbis, the web3 social network For this week's AMA we're thrilled to play host to @me_jango, Founder of @juiceboxETH, on Friday June 3rd from 12pm EST. Juicebox is akin to a decentralized Kickstarter, allowing projects to raise funding from the community all powered by public smart contracts on Ethereum.
